content: simple gloves that allow more finger movement than casual mittens and more warmth and cosiness than 5-finger gloves perfect for everyday adventures or more intense cold weather activities where you need some grip and precision recommended for a beginner with a bit of experience and knowledge of mitten construction the pattern offers a good chance to practice different stitch decreases and increases these gloves are knit in the round from bottom to top with a dk to light worsted weight yarn or sport and fingering weight yarn held together as in sample the only available size at the moment is large which would fit an average adult male hand perfectly if there is interest in other sizes please contact me
